title: The Invisible planet
creator_credit: Mauri Goldberg, National Educational Television and Prism Productions
brief_description: This film covers a twenty-four year study of Barnard’s Star, the star nearest to the earth observable from the northern hemisphere, by Doctor Peter Van De Kamp. It also shows the discovery of what is claimed to be the first planet to be found outside our solar system. Suitable for lower secondary level.
